headline: Marshall Witt named CFO of FedEx Freight, rounds out leadership team ahead of spinoff
summary: Marshall Witt, formerly CFO of TD SYNNEX, has been appointed CFO of FedEx Freight, completing the leadership team ahead of the spinoff from FedEx.

headline: FedEx Freight rounds out leadership roster, names new CFO
summary: FedEx Corp. has completed the formation of the leadership team for a standalone FedEx Freight. The post FedEx Freight rounds out leadership roster, names new CFO appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: FedEx Announces Marshall Witt as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of FedEx Freight
summary: MEMPHIS, Tenn., October 06, 2025--FedEx Corp. (NYSE: FDX) today announced that Marshall Witt, formerly the chief financial officer of TD SYNNEX, a leading global IT distributor and solutions provider, has been appointed senior vice president and chief financial officer of FedEx Freight, effective October 15.

headline: FedEx (FDX) Ramps Up Executive Incentives: Will Performance Pay Reshape Its Investment Case?
summary: In late September 2025, FedEx unveiled its fiscal 2026 Annual Cash Incentive Compensation Plan, approved a significant performance stock unit grant for executive officers, and gained shareholder support to expand its 2019 Omnibus Stock Incentive Plan by 2.1 million shares. This expansion of executive compensation incentives and stock-based awards highlights FedEx's enhanced efforts to tightly align leadership performance with operational and financial goals. We'll explore how FedEx's...
